alert.note: Alert for Eastern Plymouth; Northern Bristol; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 04 at 3:41AM EST until February 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total sleet accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of one tenth to one quarter of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of northern Connecticut, southeastern Massachusetts and northern Rhode Island. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 7 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous road conditions along with a flash freeze by late morning as temperatures fall below freezing. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain will change to freezing rain between 9 am and noon, then to sleet during the afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Plymouth; Northern Bristol; Western Plymouth
